title: Photocatalytic Valorization of Lignocellulose Biomass for Chemicals and Fuels Production via Reductive Pathways
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00597J, Review Article
Rajat Ghalta, Arzoo Chauhan, Rajendra Srivastava
Biomass, an abundant and renewable resource, particularly lignocellulosic biomass derived from agricultural and forestry waste, presents substantial potential for sustainable chemical and fuel production. It serves as a renewable source...
